title: MyLens.ai
author: Ardalan Mirshani
excerpt: MyLens is an AI that turns your raw ideas and content into clear, interactive visuals—instantly. Just drop in any source—text, PDF, image, webpage, or even a YouTube video—and MyLens builds a beautiful, editable visual that highlights what matters most, ready to present or share. It’s not just a simple graphic, but a fully interactive experience: Click any part to go deeper, explore connected visuals, and follow an AI-guided journey through your topic to to understand it deeply, step by step.
